title: Save Old Steel Frames From Rust! | Vintage MTB Restoration | Beautiful Builds
content:
For part three in this Vintage MTB Restoration Beautiful Builds video, John strips the Annapurna down to a bare frame and rust-proofs the steel from the inside, out!

Music: Lore Liege – “As Night Approaches”

Please, if you enjoy these videos, hit the subscribe button below!

 

 

The post Save Old Steel Frames From Rust! | Vintage MTB Restoration | Beautiful Builds appeared first on The Radavist.
